paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant p.Gly262AlafsTer98, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Mean age 23.7 ± 13.9 years, 77% female, Romani ethnicity

individual_records.phenotype_details: Prolonged QTc interval, suffered aborted sudden cardiac death at age 24.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The women who suffered an aborted SCD was the index patient of Family 1 (Figure 1). She suffered VF at age of 24 and was successfully resuscitated with no sequelae.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Obligated carrier who suffered sudden death before age 30.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Two other woman, who suffered SD at rest, were obligated carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Obligated carrier who suffered sudden death before age 30.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Two other woman, who suffered SD at rest, were obligated carriers.
Information about one carrier is unavailable (patients’ rejection).
an obligate carrier who refused clinical evaluation.

functional_data.summary: The variant creates a premature translational stop signal, expected to result in an absent or disrupted protein.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.population_frequency: Not registered in databases or literature.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and family segregation.
variants.additional_notes: All carriers evaluated had a prolonged QTc interval.
key_quotes: Penetrance reached a 100% and adherence to medical treatment was low.
100% of the carriers of the variant with ECG available (18/18) present alterations in the QT interval in the ECG compatible with the diagnosis of long QT syndrome.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
